ListItem(address,uint256,uint256).details: We could have an escrow contract but I choose this way bcoz the people could still be holding their nfts until bought by the buyer

BuyItem(address,uint256).notice: Method for buying listingThe owner of an NFT could unapprove the marketplace, which would cause this function to fail Ideally you'd also have a `createOffer` functionality.

ListItem(address,uint256,uint256).notice: A function to list the NFTs
